title: 工地英语
author: MateShowGod
txt_content:
我先来几句散转英语 看你们能看懂不
welcome 大家 come water one water 



MC very nb I 非常 love

replies.author: piastic
replies.txt_content: Small water 怡情 .Big water hurt body. Strong water world_the_end

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content:
就算把water当作动词“灌水”，也是come to water
第二句用的俄语语法？
